item.title: Lady Gaga to Perform at MTV Video Music Awards 2025
item.description: Lady Gaga is the latest to join the slate of performers for the MTV VMAs, taking place on Sept. 7 at 8 p.m. ET and airing on CBS and Paramount+. Gaga received the most nominations for this year’
